post:
Unmetered Xen Hybrid Servers & Virtual Private Servers!
We wanna let you to select the flexible packages, either powered by Xen or OpenVZ with basic managed or fully managed!
► Send us ticket now if you have questions or visit us @ CH Hosting for more info.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Why CH Hosting?
► Instant Setup, login to your VPS within few minutes after payment cleared.
► VPS node with 100Mbps or 1 Gbps Dedicated Connection for hardware node
► Solusvm VPS management control panel for you to reboot/reload OS/shutdown you vps.
► Intel Quad Core 9550 with 8GB RAM (Xen) or Intel Core2Duo E6400 with 4GB RAM (OpenVZ)
► Location - Denver, CO, USA (Test file: 1GBtest.zip)
► No Setup Fee
► Unmetered bandwidth for Xen VPS & Hybrid Server with low price available! (by default set at 20TB, No overage charges!)
► 24x7 Ticket Support - We are with you when you need us!
► Basic managed - we assist you to migrate from existing cpanel servers, install software, system update, security update on best effort basis!
► FREE port monitoring (get your FREE monitoring at Website Monitoring)
